amendment.description: Amendment redirects $2 million for the intelligence community whistleblowing and source protection directorate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment redirects $2 million for waste, fraud, and abuse investigations in the Intelligence Community Management Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Holt.
